titleStmt.title: A True narrative of the confession and execution of the three prisonrs [sic] at Tyburn, on Fryday the 20th of this instant July viz. Capt. Thomas Walcot, John Rouse, William Hone : all three drawn, hang'd, and quarter'd for high treason against His Majesty, and conspiring the death of the Duke of York.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Item at 853:53 incorrectly identified as Wing T2781.
